definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The stirrer member has an outer ring and a central hub which are joined by circumferentially spaced spokes.
sentences.chinese: 攪拌器成員在外環和中央樞紐是由圓周間隔輻條加入。

sentences.english: I have now replaced 7 spokes through the last couple years.
sentences.chinese: 我現在已經取代了過去幾年通過7輻條。

sentences.english: In order to participate in the network, the spokes must implicitly trust the hub.
sentences.chinese: 爲了加入網絡，各個輻條必須隱式信任輪轂。

sentences.english: Let the rim find its low tension trueness by loosening spokes.
sentences.chinese: 讓邊緣發現鬆動輻條其真實性由低張力。

sentences.english: Make sure that the axle of the back wheel goes in between the spokes of the front wheel.
sentences.chinese: 要確定後輪組的軸穿插在前輪組的輻條之間。

sentences.english: With butted spokes position the posts so they rest on the narrowest portion of spoke.
sentences.chinese: 輻條與對接，位置上最窄的部分職位，他們休息發言。

sentences.english: Could you walk into these spokes?
sentences.chinese: 但你能進入到這些“輻條“中嗎？

sentences.english: Ji BC to the first half of 2000, a gradual increase in spoke-style wheels.
sentences.chinese: 至公元前兩千紀前半，輻條式車輪逐漸增加。

sentences.english: Butting of the middle section saves additional weight.
sentences.chinese: 輻條中部因爲抽條工藝而節省了格外的重量。

sentences.english: This eliminates slack by making the spokes lie as flat as possible.
sentences.chinese: 這消除了可能通過使鬆弛的輻條謊言一樣平整。

sentences.english: But I tighten the spokes by sound.
sentences.chinese: 但我通過聲音擰緊輻條。

sentences.english: Front and rear wheels require different-length spokes.
sentences.chinese: 前後輪需要不同長度的輻條。
